game_description: Some charming pets are waiting for you to play with them - come and see what they‚Äôre up to in Pets VR! There is a lot to do in Pets Resort, some of your duties will include: Petting cute doggo, playing with adorable Cat, making sure that they both have something to snack on and are well rested, walking without a care in the world through beautiful park, playing one of multiple mini games in which you can win special points! Ready for some challenges? Time for some training! Learn special gestures and instruct your pet to perform different tricks - if you‚Äôre consistent it gets easier in time but be aware the pet can also forget some lessons! Reward yourself and your pupil and make it fancy! Exchange points to create your own collection of fun accessories for you and your pet to enjoy. Discover everything Pets VR can offer and most importantly, have fun!

review_4: I have never played this game, it was gotten for my 6 year old daughter. She loves it. This and Rec Room are her favorites. She is able to play with minimal assistance from me (normally when I don‚Äôt set the height for her and she needs to be picked up to get something). It holds her attention and I hear her laughing when she plays. What more can you ask for when it comes to entertainment?
review_5: Great concept, but for our first dog after playing for a while he just sits there barking at us, with a sponge over his head. Tried everything to get him into the bath, getting sponge wet, soaped, tried cleaning him on the spot, tried attracting him with toys, scratching him, etc. He just walks to different areas of the house and barks with the sponge icon above his head. Buggy. Had my kid start a new game, hopefully the dog isn't broken this time...
